price: E é um sinal para eles havermos carregado seus antepassados no barco repleto.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
